properties.body:
MARITIME SAFETY WEBSITES.
1. DUE TO TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES, USERS MAY
   EXPERIENCE PROBLEMS ACCESSING CAC ENABLED/NIPRNET
   MARITIME SAFETY WEBSITES AND ESYNC.
2. USERS CAN ACCESS DNC VDU PATCHES ON THE WWW 
   AT HTTPS://DNC.NGA.MIL OR FULL UPDATED DNC 
   LIBRARIES ON THE SIPRNET AT HTTP://DNC.NGA.SMIL.MIL.
3. USER CAN ALSO ACCESS ESYNC OUTSIDE OF THE 
   NGA NETWORK TO MAINTAIN DNC AND ENC AT
   HTTPS://EDGESYNC.DISTANCESUPPORT.NAVY.MIL/ESYNC.
4. FOR URGENT SERVICE CONTACT NGA NAVSAFETY, 
   DSN: 547 5455,
   COMM: 800 362 6289 OR 571 557 5455, 
   E-MAIL: NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL
   OR MSG TO NGA NAVSAFETY WASHINGTON DC.
